text:
@MikeBloomberg Mike,

Please, Please, Please do some due diligence, look into Brilacidin, probably the most promising COVID-19 therapeutic we have at hand, and help move it forward. It has been tested in 3 independent RBL labs and has shown safety in numerous clinical trials.
